documentation.text: @dev Adds two exponentials, returning a new exponential.
@dev Subtracts two exponentials, returning a new exponential.
@dev Multiply an Exp by a scalar, returning a new Exp.

documentation.text: @dev Multiply an Exp by a scalar, then truncate to return an unsigned integer.

documentation.text: @dev Multiply an Exp by a scalar, truncate, then add an to an unsigned integer, returning an unsigned integer.
@dev Divide an Exp by a scalar, returning a new Exp.

documentation.text: @dev Divide a scalar by an Exp, returning a new Exp.

documentation.text: @dev Multiplies two exponentials given their mantissas, returning a new exponential.

devdoc.author: Compound
devdoc.details: Legacy contract for compatibility reasons with existing contracts that still use MathError
devdoc.title: Exponential module for storing fixed-precision decimals

userdoc.notice: Exp is a struct which stores decimals with a fixed precision of 18 decimal places.         Thus, if we wanted to store the 5.1, mantissa would store 5.1e18. That is:         `Exp({mantissa: 5100000000000000000})`.
